projects.title: Revolving Dawn
projects.summary: A roguelike deckbuilder card game developed in Unity. The main gameplay loop is battling enemies and adding cards to your deck. The game innovates on the genre by adding an interesting magic system with the ability to transmute and destroy cards.

projects.title: Fullstack Weather Website
projects.summary: Website created with React and Flask, create an account, login, add locations to your favorites and view weather data in real time by leveraging AirVisual API.

projects.title: CI/CD Pipeline
projects.summary: Continuous Integration and Development Pipeline where pull request merges automatically trigger pushes to the development server. Rollbacks and promoting builds can easily be done by updating build image names in YML files.

projects.title: The Grid
projects.summary: A resource management game developed in Unity with ECS. Utilizing ECS and the Burst Compiler we can have 1000's of objects on the screen at once with amazing performance. Automate and watch as your grid grows itself.
